name: InfluenzaVaccineHCPCSCodesForExposureIdentification
title: Influenza vaccine HCPCS codes for exposure identification
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Influenza vaccine HCPCS codes for identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Procedure/Intervention, Immunization, Medication, or Substance.),(Inclusion Criteria: Influenza vaccine HCPCS codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Influenza a (h1n1) immunization administration (includes the physician counseling the patient/family)
Influenza a (h1n1) vaccine, any route of administration
Influenza vaccine, recombinant hemagglutinin antigens, for intramuscular use (flublok)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, for intramuscular use (agriflu)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (afluria)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (flulaval)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (fluvirin)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (fluzone)
Influenza virus vaccine, not otherwise specified

contains.display: Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, for intramuscular use (agriflu)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (afluria)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (flulaval)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (fluvirin)
Influenza virus vaccine, split virus, when administered to individuals 3 years of age and older, for intramuscular use (fluzone)
Influenza virus vaccine, not otherwise specified
